## Commercial Building Heat Pump Market Review

Natural Resources Canada is inviting proposals from interested bidders to conduct a market review of the commercial building air-source heat pump market.

### Tender Details

*  **Tender Reference**: NRCan-5000084667
*  **Tender ID**: cb-14-42937034
*  **Publication Date**: November 15, 2024
*  **Tender Closing Date**: December 10, 2024, at 14:00 hrs EST
*  **Expected Contract Start Date**: December 23, 2024
*  **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2025

### Notice Type and Method

*  **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
*  **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding

### Selection Criteria

*  **Selection Criteria**: The highest combined rating of technical merit and price will be used to evaluate proposals.

### Description of Goods or Services

Natural Resources Canada is seeking a market review of the commercial building air-source heat pump market to provide an overview of the current market for small commercial buildings across Canada. The review should include an assessment of the market size, growth trends, and supplier landscape.

### Additional Information

*  **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*  **Regions of Opportunity**: Global
*  **Regions of Delivery**: Canada
*  **Contracting Entity**: Natural Resources Canada, 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0E4, Canada
*  **Contact Person**: Anik Samson, anik.samson@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca, (613) 408-3462

### Attachments

The tender notice and documents can be downloaded from the Canada Buys Government Electronic Tendering Service website:  
[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51876/nrcan-5000084667-rfp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51876/rncan-5000084667---ddp.pdf)

### Submission Requirements

Proposals must be submitted electronically through the Canada Buys website by the tender closing date and time.
